name: Battle Tag
description: This game was made for my coding class but my teacher loved it so much he said I should publish it. Battle Tag takes the classic game of tag and adds an asymmetrical twist which makes for an interesting, dynamic experience. Each time you get tagged by the enemy, they get a point. Each time you collect a disc on the field, you get a point. Whoever has more points by the end of the round wins. Each round is 30 seconds and the difficulty is pretty tough but a fair challenge. The tagger has many ways of movement and changing the play field to keep you on the move. If tag had a boss fight, this would be it. Get to it.
